tool_description: Optimizes technician routes to minimize travel time and distance while respecting time windows, job priorities, and vehicle capacity constraints.

job_priorities.description: Priority scores for each job (parallel to job_locations)

time_windows.description: Time windows for each job in format 'HH:MM-HH:MM'

service_durations.description: Estimated service time in minutes for each job

error_messages: Mismatched array lengths: job_locations, job_priorities, and service_durations must have equal length
Invalid time window format: Use HH:MM-HH:MM format (e.g., 09:00-17:00)
Infeasible schedule: Cannot complete all jobs within time constraints
Invalid optimization objective: Must be one of [minimize_travel_time, minimize_distance, maximize_jobs]
Invalid work hours: max_work_hours must be between 1 and 16
usage: Provide technician details, job locations, priorities, and constraints to receive an optimized route sequence that minimizes travel time while meeting all requirements.

optimized_sequence.description: Optimal job visit order (indices into job_locations array)
